thread.title: Report: Google to unveil LG, Huawei Nexus phones at September 29 event
thread.title_full: Report: Google to unveil LG, Huawei Nexus phones at September 29 event - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Report: Google to unveil LG, Huawei Nexus phones at September 29 event
text: According to a report this morning from CNET, Google is planning two unveil two Nexus handset — one from LG, and one from Huawei — at an event scheduled from September 29th. Details of both the smaller “Nexus 5” made by LG and the new “Nexus 6” made by Huawei have been steadily leaking out […] »
